entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is described as having found three Chasers and Beaters for his team.

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: One of the Chasers on Harry's team. She had an excellent trial and was returned to the team.

entities.name: demelza robins
entities.description: A new Chaser who is particularly good at dodging Bludgers.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: One of the Chasers on Harry's team. She outflown all the competition and scored seventeen goals.

entities.name: jimmy peakes
entities.description: A third-year student who was chosen as one of the Beaters. He is described as being short but broad-chested.

entities.name: ritchie coote
entities.description: One of the Beaters on Harry's team. He looks weedy but aims well.

relationships.description: Harry chose Katie as one of the Chasers for his team. (‘That’s my final decision and if you don’t get out of the way for the Keepers I’ll hex you,’ he bellowed.)
Harry chose Demelza as one of the Chasers for his team. (‘That’s my final decision and if you don’t get out of the way for the Keepers I’ll hex you,’ he bellowed.)
Harry chose Ginny as one of the Chasers for his team. (‘That’s my final decision and if you don’t get out of the way for the Keepers I’ll hex you,’ he bellowed.)
Harry chose Jimmy as one of the Beaters for his team. (Neither of his chosen Beaters had the old brilliance of Fred and George, but he was still reasonably pleased with them:)
Harry chose Ritchie as one of the Beaters for his team. (Neither of his chosen Beaters had the old brilliance of Fred and George, but he was still reasonably pleased with them:)
